titleStmt.title: The holy feasts and fasts of the church. With meditations and prayers pious and proper for them. And some also upon the sacraments, and other subjects of sacred and weighty consideration, both for Christian life and comfort, in sickness, and at death. / By Dr. W. Brough D.G. and one of His late Majesty's chaplains in ordinary.
titleStmt.author: Brough, W. (William), d. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill.
